title: Siofra's Change
description: Everything seemed to be going great for werewolf couple Siofra and Conall, up until Christmas Eve when a car accident changed everything. Six months later, Siofra is still reeling from the tragedy, shutting almost everyone in her life out. Therapy brings a new friend into her life, along with one tall, tattooed twin, bad-ass biker Berserker wolf who gives her the tingles.An evil, magic weilding wolf from her past brings a dark force down upon her, casting her into the Dark Pryor Mountains. There Siofra is held captive by those she thought she destroyed, Bronton and his siblings. After her torture, she's faced with the knowledge that she might bring the end of the world. Can she sacrifice a piece of herself to save the world? Will her loved ones forgive her?The third installment in the Broadus Supernatural Society Series is packed with action, magic, romance and steamy bodies all over the place.
author: Theresa Marguerite Hewitt
